content:
cilium-dbg envoy admin logging set 
 Change logging levels of Envoy Proxy 
 Options 
   -h, --help   help for set
 
 Options inherited from parent commands 
       --config string        Config file (default is $HOME/.cilium.yaml)
  -D, --debug                Enable debug messages
  -H, --host string          URI to server-side API
      --log-driver strings   Logging endpoints to use (example: syslog)
      --log-opt map          Log driver options (example: format=json)
 
 SEE ALSO 
 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin logging 	 - List and change logging levels of Envoy Proxy 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin logging set global 	 - Change global logging level for all loggers of Envoy Proxy 
 cilium-dbg envoy admin logging set loggers 	 - Change logging level of a list of loggers of Envoy Proxy
